transArray.content: The hotel is very good, especially the breakfast variety.

Dear guest, thank you for choosing Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel among many hotels. Thank you very much for your review and support. The hotel's breakfast time is from 7:00 to 11:00. The Chinese and Western buffet breakfast is diverse and nutritious. , freshly cooked noodles, hot soup noodles and small pastries will satisfy your special delicacies without leaving home. The hotel's considerate service and a cup of hot tea will make you feel at home. The room you stay in has the most trustworthy The cleaning aunt provides attentive service like a housekeeper and looks forward to your visit. General Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
